archimate:Requirement.name: PA.1.3.4: Office equipment should be connected to a dedicated network for print servers and multi-function devices (e.g. a virtual local area network (VLAN)) to prevent access from unauthorised endpoint devices (including servers, desktop computers, mobile devices and consumer devices).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
